body:
Comment 8: 
Hi Russ,

Works for me for a few packages now. Thanks Russ, this is an excellent improvement.

lucky(~/go/src/pkg/fmt) % make coverage
gotest
rm -f _test/fmt.a
6g  -o _gotest_.6 doc.go format.go print.go scan.go  
gopack grc _test/fmt.a _gotest_.6 
mallocs per Sprintf(""): 1
mallocs per Sprintf("xxx"): 2
mallocs per Sprintf("%x"): 2
mallocs per Sprintf("%x %x"): 2
PASS
